definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Shorthand and typewriting have been described as the twin arts.
sentences.chinese: 速记和打字被说成是一对孪生技巧。
她于下午5时产下孪生儿。

sentences.english: She is often mistaken for her twin sister.
sentences.chinese: 她常被误认为她的孪生姐姐。

sentences.english: People are always confusing the twins.
sentences.chinese: 人们常误认这两位孪生子。

sentences.english: Then, mao Zhijian discovery is small beautiful still have Zu Xiaoai of elder sister of a twin.
sentences.chinese: 接着，毛志坚发现小丽还有一个孪生姐姐祖小艾。

sentences.english: Gross crystalline imperfections like twinning are apparent to the unaided eye .
sentences.chinese: 粗的晶体不完整性，如孪生体可用肉眼看出。

sentences.english: In the ideology of many ethnics, the twins have the same soul.
sentences.chinese: 在许多民族的观念中，孪生子具有同一个灵魂。

sentences.english: The twenty-two twins twisted wrists twice on the Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 二十二个孪生子在圣诞前夜拧了两次手腕。

sentences.english: New style industrialization and urbanization are twins in the process of modernization.
sentences.chinese: 新型工业化与城镇化是现代化进程中的一对孪生子。

sentences.english: It is hard to distinguish him from his twin brother.
sentences.chinese: 很难辨认出他和他的孪生兄弟。

sentences.english: I can't tell him from his twin brother.
sentences.chinese: 我分不出他和他的孪生兄弟。

sentences.english: Surgery has been cancelled to separate three-year-old twin girls joined at the head.
sentences.chinese: 分开两名3岁大头颅相连的孪生儿的手术被取消。

sentences.english: So that's why love and faith must be emotional, spiritual twins.
sentences.chinese: 因此，爱和信心是情感与属灵的孪生儿。

sentences.english: Well, Corin and I were twins.
sentences.chinese: 哦，原来科林和我是孪生兄弟。

sentences.english: The twin sisters have a happy disposition.
sentences.chinese: 这一对孪生姐妹有一种乐天的性格。

definition: (of siblings) having the same mother but different fathers/half (brother or sister)
(of siblings) having the same father but different mothers/half (brother or sister)
(of siblings) having the same father but different mothers
